function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Short lifespan of study in a quickly evolving social media ecosystem","Impact":"Risk of outdated or irrelevant information being disseminated","Mitigation":"Frequent updates and validation of information","Technologies":"Data analytics and monitoring tools","People":"Researchers, social media users","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Inaccuracy of information on wearing masks in coronavirus prevention articles","Impact":"Potential dissemination of incorrect prevention measures","Mitigation":"Fact-checking and verification of information before sharing","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, data analytics","People":"Social media users, general public","Owner":"Health authorities, fact-checking organizations"},{"Description":"Potential bias introduced by the use of Buzzsumo in the study","Impact":"Unrecognized bias in the research findings","Mitigation":"Transparency about the limitations of the study and the use of Buzzsumo","Technologies":"Publication of study methodology and findings","People":"Research team, readers of the study","Owner":"Research team"}]}
